attributes.action: Only a Welsh MP can be the Secretary of State for Wales
attributes.additional_details: The Secretary of State for Wales has an important role regarding reserved legislation and affairs for Wales, as well as Welsh devolution. As such, we believe that only a Welsh MP should have such an important role regarding Wales. Only a Welsh Secretary of State for Wales would truly be able to stand up for Wales, delivering the best for Wales and ensuring that Wales is treated fairly.
